column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=I travel to the local nursery to select a tree for planting , today I have decided to purchase a flowering maple tree .
#id=2
#text=I ensure the one I pick is high quality with no rotting and looks healthy .
#id=3
#text=Once in my yard I determine the best location based on the expected height it will grow and other plants in the yard .
#id=4
#text=With my garden shovel I dig a hole at least twice the size of the roots of the tree .
#id=5
#text=I ensure rocks and are removed from the hole .
#id=6
#text=I put plenty of organic matter in the hole to ensure good growth .
#id=7
#text=I gently place the tree in the hole and refill with the shoveled dirt .
#id=8
#text=I place my garden hose at the base of the tree and turn the water to a very slow stream so it will absorb into the soil properly .
#id=9
#text=I allow the water to run for about and hour ensuring it does n't get soggy .
#text=I step back and admire my new tree and envision what it will look like a year from now .
